website_summaries.verdict: A firm half-moon bolster that comfortably supports your knees and back without losing its shape.
pros: Can be placed under the legs and knees
Large size suitable for all users
cons: Not everyone likes how firm this bolster is

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent
customer_reviews.text: For memory foam it pretty firm. Which is good for what it’s for. Wish it was thicker to get a better elevation. In the middle of the night I have to take the blanket off my legs. The pillow holds in lots of heat. I’m 5 2”. Pregnant 25 weeks with a sciatic nerve pain. This pillow has made lounging more comfortable. But not so much sleeping. I kick it aside and end up grabbing my cotton pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Marvi Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Services
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a wonderful product! I use it to support my back when I sleep and the half moon design makes it not to “slide out” like regular pillows. And the firmness really helps in relieving my back pain (particularly my lower back). Thus, highly recommend this product. And I also like to Thera Health Brand’s service. I had a some issues with the first pillow and upon bringing it to their attention, they immediately got back to me, and resolved my issue by sending a replacement pillow, which turns out perfect! Their attentiveness and professionalism in handling the issue deserve a five stars rating as well.
customer_reviews.author: May Leung

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this bolster!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this half-moon bolster. It took about 10 hours for it to completely plump up. It is the perfect size! Pain in my knees and lower back is immediately lessened/eliminated by using this under my knees when sitting in a reclining chair or lying in bed. I feel like the dimensions are perfect for me. The foam is just right--not too soft or too hard. I like that I can remove the cover for cleaning. Thank you for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Marlea Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made foam pillow. As I pulled it out of the package the zipper fell off, it was dry rotted. I bought this based on the majority of positive reviews, however, I either have different expectations/standards of quality pillows or I just recieved a lemon. I was upset to learn that no refunds were allowed, however, Amazon told me that they would refund my money and I could donate the pillow, which I did. That was very considerate. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Knee support bolster pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Without this support, I couldn't sleep at all. I have a pinched nerve in my lower back and this really does relieve the pressure. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Pearson

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've got a stupid back, and I'm also a hot sleeper. I've been using a regular pillow to prop my knees up or raise my top leg when I'm side sleeping. This is... not ideal. Esp because my regular pillow makes me super hot. This is perfect. It's sturdy enough to prop up my legs, straighten out my back, and for side sleeping when I need to keep my top leg elevated. AND it doesn't make me feel like I'm sleeping in hellfire. Totally cool and chill. :-) And the cover is washable! yay!
customer_reviews.author: L A

customer_reviews.title: Too low, too light, and too small
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this pillow. It’s way too low and provides no elevation to my knees at all. I am not a large person: female, 5’4”, 125 lbs. I have tried so many pillows for sleeping, and only a few actually worked for me. This pillow is so light and so small that it doesn’t stay in place and usually ends up on the floor by morning. I absolutely do NOT recommend it if you actually need to have your knees elevated.
customer_reviews.author: Kokopelli

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had both of my hips replaced and have to sleep on my back. I have tried several pillows to place behind my knees for back support & comfort. This half moon bolster is the absolute BEST! It is just the right height & density. It is very comfortable & I am sleeping so much better. I would highly recommend this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: updating my review -
customer_reviews.text: Product came with mildew on both sides and a tear on the inside. I contacted the seller and within a few hours they had responded and sent a new one overnight. What excellent customer service. They were clearly not only concerned with their product, but with my satisfaction. Top notch!! Now, on to the product itself. I have constant lower back pain and stiffness. I have tried using regular pillows but it didn't really help. After using this one night, my back stiffness was relieved significantly. It's very comfortable. Not too stiff but not to cushy either. Good product and great seller. Highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Love my half-moon pillow!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this product, I use it every night. It really helps me keep my lower back issues at bay -- my lower back does not arch as much when the wedge is placed under my knees (if I'm positioned with my back on the bed). But I also use it when side sleeping (between the knees). I prefer this longer pillow vs have a short curved wedged between the knees. I find it more comfortable. Would recommend to anyone needing sleep support or sitting-in-bed support. And more than that, I recommend the seller. Provides quick responses to questions and requests and really very reasonable. Made the whole purchase experience so pleasant for me.
customer_reviews.author: EMDL

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Suprised.....in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this would be too small and that it would be like using my pillow. I was absolutely wrong. This is fantastic. I put it under my knees if I'm lying on my back and it's perfect. Also if I decide to sleep on my side, I just put it in between my legs st my knees and I get the best sleep ever. Way better than the one I had before. I will never be without it as my sleep has never been better. If you are a back or side sleeper. This is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my husband who has back/hip issues. Your item description is misleading. He tried to use it only once but it isn’t thick enough. Very disappointed that it cannot be returned. Absolutely mis leading web description.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t puff up, flat
customer_reviews.text: This can’t be right. It’s flat. $27 for this was a TOTAL LOSS.
customer_reviews.author: The Gray Family

customer_reviews.title: If I could give no stars....
customer_reviews.text: This is one reason I am decreasing my spending on Amazon. False advertising. 100% money-back guarantee...not when you try to return it, this is a non-returnable item. Organic cotton cover, I seriously doubt it. Made in the USA, nope, made in China. Also if you have fragrance allergies it comes with a scented hanging disc that is supposed to mask the chemical odor of the memory foam which it did not succeed. The pillow goes flat once warm so no support.
customer_reviews.author: JACampbell

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. Thankfully purchased this on amazon prime day and didn’t spend (or lose) as much money on this useless product. The picture shows the height of the material to be higher, but that is far from the case. Followed the directions and let the cushion expand for two days. Even after a few days; the cushion barely expanded. Used the cushion a couple times and wound up tossing this space waster off my bed because it goes flat in minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAre

customer_reviews.title: No return policy.
customer_reviews.text: The bolster was too hard and I wanted to return it. There is a no return policy which I was not aware of. I sent an email to the company and never heard back from them. It is sitting in my closet unused. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L G

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, supportive, washable cover, eases pain
customer_reviews.text: Amended *** The memory foam flattened quickly... Is not at all comfortable as it makes the back of your knees/legs uncomfortably hot and sweaty. Have purchased a different brand's claiming to cool and with denser foam for same price. *********************** I love that this pillow is soft and well designed. The outer cover comes off easily and can be washed at any time. It has great support alleviating my back pain and allowing my to rest and watch tv in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni and Gary

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand when taken out of condensed packaging it was shipped in
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped in a tiny box sealed in plastic. When plastic seal was broken pillow did not expand to the size it should be. The pillow is disformed and will not expand. Unable to return or exchange product for being defective. WASTE OF MONEY! & highly dissatisfied that I can not request a new one. Don’t waste your money on this product, would of rather went with another pillow where they stood by their product and a exchange to send a non-defective one could have been done.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like this pillow at all-it feels like it’s not quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this pillow at all-it feels like it’s not quite big enough under the knees-and when I turn to my side to use a wedge it’s very uncomfortable-unfortunately it is a non-returnable item
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT has come!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped . I'm a senior and recently, words like "degenerative slipped, arthritis, disks and lots of 'another treatment' " have rapidly been increased in conversations. This pillow has so many blessings, it's amazing. Along with that, the affordability, for someone on a fixed income, or any tight income, will find relief. Actually, more than imagined. I am praying my next Soc. Sec. deposit will allow for a second purchase. No, I don't have any connection with this company nor am I senile. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: great lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as a lift under my knees for sleeping, but found it is the perfect support for my husband's reading chair. If you struggle with lumbar support in your upholstered furniture, this provides firm support and its width is about perfect for a reading chair. We had it covered in matching upholstery. I will probably purchase two more for the couch and have slip covers made. I also appreciate the packaging. You will think this tiny box is an obvious mistake and roll your eyes that you'll have to do a return and reorder, but then you'll be pleasantly surprised when you snip the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product for relief of back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow when I was told to sleep on my back to improve my posture. (I was also told to get different pillows for my neck.) I have never slept on my back, so this took adjustments on my part. Getting used to the knee pillow was the easiest -- and the fastest to indicate relief of pain. I still roll onto my side occasionally, but even that is decreasing. I find nothing to dislike about this knee pillow. But I'm quite short and weigh about 115. It's probably a good idea to take that into consideration if one is contemplating this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aging Lefty Woman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There is very little is memory form in this product. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jagerson

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm Wedge Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow because my doctor had recommended this type of pillow to use under my knees when sleeping. I initially had purchased a roll pillow at a retail store, and it was quite comfortable but way too short and kept moving during sleep. This pillow seemed to meet the need. It stayed in place; however, it turned out to be way too firm and caused pain in my knees. [The former pillow, although too short, had flexibility and was quite comfortable.] Otherwise, it is nicely constructed and should serve the needs of someone who needs a very firm pillow. It just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, comfortable against the back of the knees.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is working great. I really like that it doesn't slid around at night due to the half round shape. I would prefer if it was a but taller, but I am overall happy with the pillow. I probably need to get used to it. I definitely recommend this for people who sleep better with their knees bent slightly. Later.... I did get used to the pillow and I am finding that I am using it more than just for my behind knees. I even found myself hugging the pillow to my chest a few nights ago. If you like to have an extra pillow, one that can be used for multiple things, you should get this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K

customer_reviews.title: Firm enough while being comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like to side sleep but have hip pain if i don't prop up my top leg on something. Most pillows and other rolls are too soft and don't keep me in the alignment i need. This one fits the bill. Only one problem, I have to flip it to each side as I change sides. Hence, my review, I'm back to buy the second one, no more flipping. These are also invaluable in sitting up in bed and as a neck support watching tv. Very useful. The cover comes off to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: DrL

customer_reviews.title: Knee pain is gone
customer_reviews.text: My knee pain (actually just below the knee in the goose foot region) disappeared after one night of sleeping on my back with this pillow under my knees. Associated lower back/hip pain is also much improved. I had these aches for 15 years. I had always slept on my side, and when I attempted to sleep on my back, I had more back problems. Using a regular pillow under my knees didn't work—it just ended up by my feet. I'm using this bolster along with a cervical pillow (Coisum back sleeper) and I have almost no pain. I wish I had known this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: ncbocck

customer_reviews.title: Probably be fine for smaller person
customer_reviews.text: It does help some for me, if it was wider and thicker for me I don't sleep with my legs that close together to share one pillow. I am 6'3"very broad and that one kind of disappears after awhile trying to keep both legs knees on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firmness
customer_reviews.text: I am using this pillow to support my knees when I sleep on my back or side. I am 5'6" and 240lbs. It is the perfect size to lift my knees to relieve lower back pain. When I turn on my side, I can easily move the pillow between my knees to keep in an ergonomic position. The pillow has a very soft, removable case making it easy to wash and comfortable on the skin. The pillow itself is firm enough to maintain healthy spacing despite my weight and size. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: Just awkward to get used to when you have been using a pillow between your legs for years. Because of it's shape and firmness, it isn't as easy to just grab and move around and I do a fair amount of moving, switching sides before I settle. Basically if you get in bed and lay on one side and immediately fall asleep in that position, this will likely do fine for you. But if you get in bed and read while resting various body parts on multiple pillows, then this can get a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: MoveMeIntoBooks

customer_reviews.title: Provides the support/comfort I need
customer_reviews.text: I recently had hip replacement surgery and was looking for a pillow that I could use under my knees as well as between my legs when sleeping on my side. This item fits the bill. I have no complaints about the memory foam. It is firm and does not lose the firmness while being used. It helps to alleviate the leg pain I've had. I liked it so much that I purchased a second one so that I have the ready support available to me both upstairs and downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: DogLover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knee to ankle support while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many leg/knee pillows in different shapes and promises, but a consistent issue for me is the awkward angle they create from my knee to my foot. I appreciate that this pillow is long enough to give my knees the supported separation that benefits my hips and back, AND supports my leg down to my ankle. I also use the pillow while laying on my back and it provides just enough elevation for both knees. I wake up with much less knee and leg pain!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 70+ woman with fibromyalgia, arthritis, and a pinched spinal nerve that causes back, hip and leg pain. I’ve used a foam knee pillow for years but it was only minimally effective in promoting better sleep. My new half moon bolster pillow is a huge improvement. It is cushy but not too soft, and gently supports my knees. I’m sleeping better (time-release melatonin helps, too). I would recommend this pillow to anyone with nerve pain problems leading to back, hip and leg discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace B.

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions carefully!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as big as I expected. It won’t give me the support I need. This is non-returnable thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cushioned
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know a product like this existed! The cushy foam is great for any spot you decide to use it for. For a side sleeper this is great especially if you put a pillow in between your knees. This cushion can also be great for other areas when you sleep to avoid pressure. The covering on the outside is very soft and there is a zipper where you can take it off and wash as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product; it’s been useful for me.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product quickly, and in great condition. I’ve already used it, and find it does well in alleviating pressure from my lower back when I use it under my knees when I lie on my back at night (I’m a back sleeper). I’m using this product in addition to a small wedge for supporting the arch in my back while I’m back-sleeping, and a roll pillow for under my neck. My back has been less tight the last two mornings. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful, cannot return item
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this pillow is good for some, but definitely not for larger or muscular people. The main issue is, YOU CANNOT RETURN THE PILLOW. the density of the foam is firm, which is good in this case, but the pillow itself is pretty thin. I saw the measurements of the pillow before purchasing, but didn't realize how thin it was until I received and tried a few nights. It's good underneath the knees/legs, but it terrible for a side sleeper, especially someone like me who's muscular, because the pillow moves a lot during sleep and I ended waking up with it not even between my legs. It should work for smaller people though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Ho-Hum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow three years ago. I've got to say, it wasn't a game changer. It is indeed very firm; perhaps it just wasn't the best answer for my specific issues - I was looking for lumbar and neck support. What this pillow does do well, though, is quickly discolor. From what? I don't know, but after about a week of normal use (and proper bathing by its user!), it was an upsetting orange-y color. And I've never been able to bleach it back. Using this pillow is better than using nothing, but I'm not crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: TheNewMrsBill

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my hip & knee injury
customer_reviews.text: I injured my hip and knee. A painful muscular injury. I like to sleep on my side. After this arrived I let it expand/fluff for 2 days as the package said. When I sleep I use this wedge between my legs (knees) and it allows me to sleep thru the night. It's the right size for between my legs. I put it under my legs at the knee to keep me comfortable when lying in bed (reading, watching tv). The cover comes off easily to wash it. Getting it back in the cover can be a chore.
customer_reviews.author: A Nurd

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the pillow I thought I had made a mistake, but I decided to give it a shot and I'm glad I did. This pillow is just about perfect for going under my thighs (when sleeping on my back) or between my knees (when sleeping on my side). It's taken a few weeks to really adjust to sleeping with it, but my back problems are slowly disappearing and I'm not as sore when I wake up. Great product, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CriscoLord

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly comfortable for someone who likes to sleep on their side ...
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly comfortable for someone who likes to sleep on their side with one leg forward. Instead of my spine being slightly twisted (and having back problems already, it is really bad to do), it allows my leg to have support and my spine stays straight.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Soft Material
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this pillow is that it's soft, it's a bit narrow for my use but it's still usable. I purchased it for my massage table and wanted to give back relief for my clients but it's just not as tall as I expected so I use another pillow under it to give the height and then this on top to give it form.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Knee Support Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I had been using an ordinary bed pillow under my knees at night to sleep but wanted something a little higher and firmer. This cushion is perfect. It is not too hard nor too soft. It raises my knees a bit higher than the pillow which is good. I have low back and hip issues that make this sort of cushion necessary. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This little pillow is great for under your ankles when you sleep on your stomach and under your knees when you sleep on your back! I do need something a little thicker for between my legs when I sleep on my side but even then I use thisnunder my ankles. I love this little pillow and can’t sleep without it. It’s been about 2 months since I got it and I’ve had no issue with firmness changing. I hope it lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Product is good quality, too thick for me to use a neck support
customer_reviews.text: The pillow itself is fine and appears to be good quality, I primarily use it between my knees when sleeping on my side. I found the thickness to high to be comfortable as a neck support.
customer_reviews.author: MzPisces

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Good for me as my recliner tends to push my shoulders forrard, causing lower back pain, and some shoulder issues as well. It also fits well in the space on the recliner between the seat and the back - which is an area with a hard surface that causes discomfort. Not sure it poofed out to the height of 4 inches - but it's still a very comfortable thickness and firmness level. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft, and compact
customer_reviews.text: I really love this half pillow booster. I sleep with it every night and have it placed under my knees for support. It has really helped with my restless leg issues and the leg cramping. I have also been using the booster as a divider/pillow to sleep with between my knees when I'm sleeping on my side. I find this pillow to be very comfortable. It's also light and compact, in which I can see myself traveling very easily with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this nightly for a lift under my legs sleeping on my back. It works fine. just wish it was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great back support
customer_reviews.text: My partner had been having back problems his entire life. He's been using a regular pillow under his legs for support but it just wasn't enough. He's been using this new cushion for over a month now and he said he's noticed a huge difference. It took about a week for him to notice a difference but over time it's made for a much more peaceful sleep and much less back pain in the morning. It doesn't cure all pain but it definitely greatly reduces pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good Low Back support
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my low back pain. Use it right in my lumbar area for added support. Holds it's shape well. Haven't tried it yet between my knees at night while sleeping. Plan on giving it a try for that also.
customer_reviews.author: TSKTSK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a regular pillow under my head one night, and then as a knee pillow the next night. It's more comfortable than my regular pillow that I use under my head. As for using it as a knee pillow, I think it works well, but I need to test it out more. I've been having a lot of pain, so just trying to see what works well for me. So far this pillow is good and I have no complaints. It also smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: This bleeping WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a commercial truck driver for over forty years. For the last twenty five years I have had HORRIBLE lower back pain and my right leg up by my hip would hurt so bad that I would have trouble getting dressed in the morning. I started using the pillow about two weeks ago. The back pain has been GREATLY reduced and my leg has felt unbelievable. HARDLY any pain. I know everybody is different but this has worked like a dream for me. I just retired and I'll hopefully be able to fish, hunt and do yard work pain free this year WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of firmness but with give
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put under my regular pillow to elevate me some. It stays firm the way that I want it to. But it's not so firm that it doesn't give. Recently took it camping and it was easy to take off the cover and wash it. And I let it air dry and it went back on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this horrible pillow. Arrived deflated and unusable and guess what? NO RETURNS! I’m out $25 for a piece of garbage. Save your money and the environment as this pillow will surely make its way to your garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Back Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pillow under my knees for over a week, and I'm finding it to be quite amazing! I've always struggled with back pain when sleeping on my back, but that's most comfortable for me. This was super helpful. A week in and it still hasn't flattened or anything. If that changes soon, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: I use it on a oversized large chair that I love but is to large
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed for my back. I use it on a oversized large chair that I love but is to large. I like that the cover can be removed for washing and the price was just right. AAA SELLER and fast shipping. Great for giving.
customer_reviews.author: mae reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this pillow an the firm support it provides. It did take almost 4 days for it to expand to its full shape, so be patient because it’s worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Buzy B

customer_reviews.title: Best for leg pain
customer_reviews.text: I love this cushy form from the start. The only thing is if you have sensitive skin please wash the cover first. Other than that once I washed the cover everything is fine. I feel like there is better circulation in my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Jack

customer_reviews.title: This cushion needs support🤔
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than pictured. My husband is 6'4" 265lbs & this didn't work for him. He has mild back issues. I'm 5'3" 130lbs w/chronic daily back pain & this item did nothing 😮🙄. I ended up using it to go between my knees to alleviate some of the pain. The cushion is really soft & offers minimal support. If I could return it, I would. It's definitely not worth the $22.50 I paid for it. Hope you have better luck with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MrsGAShaft0723

customer_reviews.title: STURDY ANS WORK
customer_reviews.text: I use this bolster in my esthetics room for my clients and it works well! Helps to eliminate back pain when laying on my treatment bed! It’s sturdy and has a nice soft & durable fabric that hold in the foam! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband's bad knee that feels better when elevated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's bad knee that feels better when elevated. This is just the right shape and height. Putting the knee up with the half-moon helps him sleep better at night. I would recommend this pillow. The cover comes off nicely, so it can be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money not eligible for exchange!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible pillow and unable to return! Waste of $27!! Never took shape and appears as if someone purchased spilled on it and returned. Had I know I couldn’t return/exchange I would have never bought. It came in the box rolled in a ball and after taking out of packaging it still remains flat and misshapen 72 hours later. If I could rate a zero I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's decent. Smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: Took 12 hours to expand fully but it's still a lot smaller than I had thought. 4.5" is not nearly enough to put under your knees while laying on your back. This would be better if it was a "full moon" (cylinder) shape rather than half if you're using it for that purpose. Overall it gives me some support on my legs where I didn't have it before so I'm keeping it. It's too wide to support as a neck pillow FYI
customer_reviews.author: lowtek

customer_reviews.title: I like this new 1/2 roll
customer_reviews.text: I like this new 1/2 roll,it's perfect for my needs. It arrived vacuum sealed and all squished up. After opening i allowed a few hours for it to reshape and lose that weird new foam odor. It's nice that it's got a remivable washable zipper cover. It apears to be a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but not a miracle.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow definitely helps some, if you sleep on your back. If you sleep on your side, it’s a little less help, but still not nothing. If you sleep on your stomach then this obviously is of no use to you at all. All in all, it’s not bad, it’s not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedge!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my hubs in conjunction with a knee pillow. He absolutely loves it. He has been using a clunky king sleeping pillow for years - messy!
customer_reviews.author: Producers Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great for hip pain
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this half moon pillow, I tried the small little wedge pillows but they weren't long enough. I needed something that would go from my knees to my ankle to help with the pain in my hips, this pillow has done wonders for the pain. Would highly recommend to anyone who wakes up with hip pain in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Half moon bolster pillow a blessing
customer_reviews.text: Have sciatica/knee/leg/nerve pain every day. Cannot get comfortable in most positions but this bolster helps my left leg a bunch in allowing me to get comfortable enough to sleep. Thankful for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Useful Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This half bolster pillow is very useful. It can be used under the knee or lower back when sitting or reclined to adjust body posture and relieve pain and pressure. It can also be used as a pillow to support proper posture when sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to relieve my back pain. It definitely helps and keeps my body in a comfortable position while sleeping. Very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: It might be short?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality, solid/firm pillow. To keep both my knees on it I have to lay with my legs closer together than I would normally sleep. It does provide relief and I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Noxqqq

customer_reviews.title: worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly in good condition. vacuum packed in a small box but when you take off the plastic (carefully do not use sharp) it expands and is comfortable. knee pillow takes stress off lower back. worth the price; good item, can use as side or back bolster pillow. have not had to clean but probably wipe with damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: BaxterCatser

customer_reviews.title: Helps with knee pain.
customer_reviews.text: Great for when my knees are in excruciating pain. I have torn meniscus and osteoarthritis and this cushion helps keep my knees in a more comfortable position when in bed or reclining chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Easy to clean and comfortable. It definitely helps my back pain at night. I have been sleeping better which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for healing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a relative that is recuperating from surgery and it has really provided much needed relief to tense areas and needing to sleep on her back. Only 4 stars for easy to clean because she hasn't needed to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Chatskid

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought the pillow my lower back feels better
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned on how small the box was. However, when I opened it up the pillow/bolster expanded. I sniffed it then and smelled a slight "mechanical" smell. I waited 24 hours and the smell was gone. GREAT leg pillow. My lower back feels better when using the pillow. I am glad I bought the pillow
customer_reviews.author: Peppicheep

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well if I sleep on my back, under my knees. Also if I roll to my side, is very comfy between my knees. Much better than the pillow I was using. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Half-moon wedge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to raise my knees to make sleeping on my back less a problem. It is not quite as firm as I would like and I would like it to be a bit higher. However, that is not the fault of the product. Since this is my first under knee wedge, I didn't know what to get. I will get another one in the future that is a bit higher. When I sleep on my side, I put this wedge between my knees. It works great for that. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gulliver

customer_reviews.title: Supports my neck as I'm training to become a back-sleeper
customer_reviews.text: They say sleeping on your stomach is the worst and second to that is sleeping on your side- Just as bad for your spinal cord alignment and instantly puts kinks in your back and neck and cuts off circulation. I'm a culprit of both of these modalities. After my recent purchase of this pillow, I've had less of neck pain upon waking and it's also helped me by supporting my neck property so that sleeping on my back has become more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: What a HUGE improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using an extra pillow under my knees (& between my knees when lying on my side). It was so cumbersome to arrange & rearrange (getting hung up on the other bedding) when I changed position. This is easy to maneuver & when I wake up in the morning it does not look like a war zone........ I am soooo pleased & so is my back!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pillow like this and left it at a relatives house out of state. I ordered this one, it came quickly and I love it! I use it for my head pillow, and it keeps my spine in alignment and lets me get a full nights sleep. And, as a bonus, It keeps my hair from getting all smashed like a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ray

customer_reviews.title: Firm but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is firm enough yet gentle for positioning. It appears to be made quite well but only time will tell. I use it every day but it keeps its firmness.
customer_reviews.author: PRM

customer_reviews.title: Soft support for lower back but not so good for legs!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a support pillow that has plenty of give but can provide support To improve posture and comfort, this is it. I found it too soft for my needs as I was seeking a very firm support for my legs like what massage therapists use. More importantly though is that the company has excellent service to provide customer satisfaction. I was extremely impressed with an inquiry even before I received the product and the. Quick follow ups to my concerns. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Strout

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and used it last night. Very happy with it. I was using a folded throw pillow and it was a hassle. This is firm enough to keep your knees bent but soft enough to feel good. Also works between knees when I'm on my side. Well worth it-hey, I'm worth it..lol!
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: works on knees, and more
customer_reviews.text: this is a great support pillow for all sorts of uses. it is stiff enough to give support, but soft enough to be comfortable all night long.. the half moon design keeps it from wandering around while i'm sleeping, which is a plus.. overall, i'm quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: This knee pillow has been a miracle pain relief for me. I had great difficulty getting to sleep and staying asleep due to back pain before using the knee pillow. I am so happy now and feeling more rested. Excellent quality and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for about a week, so I can’t speak to durability over time. It ships compressed but expands fully in minutes. Good firmness. Company emailed me after arrival encouraging me to reply if my experience was anything less than five stars. I will update review if I ever have a problem, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile85

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow I have been looking for. Firm enough to support knees. Just the right height. And I have also been using for knee support while sleeping on my side. As an added benefit, I use it in bed as a prop for my computer. Love it. Purchased second pillow for my sister. Just purchased third pillow for a friend, who has not yet used it. A good well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: MGarrett

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this item but it quickly deflated and doesn't have the stability it advertises. Now it's about 2" tall, when it should be 4.5. Find yourself an old pillow and it will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Scudders

customer_reviews.title: Just what my knees need
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have severe joint pain, specially my knees, and this pillow has been so helpful. I tried tucking regular pillows under my knees or ankles and they just didn’t work. This came quickly, great quality, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sade KMassi

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well despite mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about buying this at first when reading some of these reviews along with the no return policy. But I took a chance and it worked out. The pillow arrived all compressed as others described, but I found that it inflated fully after only a few hours. Provides support I need under or between the knees and not too bulky. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BiotechGrL22

customer_reviews.title: Isn't for me
customer_reviews.text: While the pillow may be cushy, it just doesn't work well for me. It doesn't fit comfortably between my legs & since one side is flat, it also doesn't stay in place. I'm currently trying to return the item, but for some reason it's acting like my return date has expired. I've contacted customer service so we shall see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great use for those who are bed-ridden.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this pillow. I am basically bed-ridden, at 29yrs. This pillow helps keep my legs, mainly my hip and knees from hurting so bad. I've had the pillow for almost a month now. I still get pain in my joints, but this helps with my poor circulation, and keeps me from getting stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable memory foam support
customer_reviews.text: I often sleep sort of half rolled to one side or the other. This pillow is long enough to provide great support for those positions. It's also great between my knees, when I'm fully on my side. I especially liked that replacement covers were available for it.
customer_reviews.author: SetterRescueMom

customer_reviews.title: Wait for pillow to expand!
customer_reviews.text: Wait for a pillow to expand after receiving it out of the box before judging the size of it. I made that mistake. Now that it is expanding I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my son, but let my 89-year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, but let my 89-year old mother use, she has brittle bones and has had many back surgeries. She found instant relief sitting in her chair. INSTANT! It was very supportive of her back. I now need to purchase another replacement for my son, grandma never gave that up.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely comfortable and helps your lower back. Whether it's tucked between your knees if you're a side sleeper or under your knees if you sleep on your back it helps alleviate lower back pain for me.
customer_reviews.author: C M Poulin

customer_reviews.title: good quality but not an adequate size
customer_reviews.text: Quality of pillow is great. While they provide measurements of the pillow it's hard to determine if it's a good size until you use it. For back pain relief it's just a little too small. I suspect if it was at least 1.5x bigger I could get the adequate support. I am 5'4" but I think this is meant for someone smaller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gemmellaro

customer_reviews.title: Finally . . . A good night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from extreme bag and leg pain when I sleep. I have been using a regular memory foam pillow between my legs at night but it is hard to keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bulging disk in my lower back and this has helped me get a good nights sleep. I do wish it was a little more comfy with side sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: CElkins86

product_meta.title: Knee Pillow for Back Pain - Half Moon Bolster Pillow - Provides Relief and Support for Sleeping on Side, Stomach or Back - Memory Foam Semi Roll Leg Pillow Wedge with Washable Organic Cotton Cover
feature_bullets: ✅LEG ELEVATOR - Place under your knees for elevating your legs while sleeping on your back, or position under your ankles to lift your feet for better circulation while reducing varicose veins or assisting with post surgery recovery. The ideal cushion for sleeping on your side or back while relieving low back pain

✅KNEE PILLOW - Eases back, leg, knee, ankle and hip joint pain by providing proper spinal alignment when sleeping. Simply insert the bolster between your knees and sleep on the side most comfortable for you. This dual layer firm bolster pillow with a memory foam top layer is covered by an extra soft breathable and washable organic cotton cover case

✅MULTI-PURPOSE - The perfect pain reliever positioning pillow. Ideal for side sleeper, back sleepers, during pregnancy or after surgery. Provides therapeutic support in multiple areas of the body. The perfect solution to elevate your knees when sleeping. Size 20.5" x 8" x 4.5"
✅TRUSTED - Recommended by Physical Therapists, Doctors, Sports Trainers and Chiropractors. Cushy Form uses 100% Visco-elastic memory foam

✅GUARANTEE - We have a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, NO CATCHES! If you're not thrilled with your purchase for any reason, just tell us and we'll refund 100% of your purchase price - anytime! ✅IDEAL GIFT for Mother's Day, Labor Day Sale, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Prime Deal Day or Christmas
